segments.text: Did you go to the movie yesterday ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What did you think of it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't think much of the film .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think it is the worst one I have ever seen .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , I'm not sure I agree with you . It was not a good one , but it was not the worst one . Actually , it wasn't too bad .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What's more , some scenes were good , much fit for the children .
segments.speaker: S2
